strings.evolution:
I can become even stronger.
Alright, just need to concentrate a bit harder.
strings.affinity:
I couldn't do anything on my own.
It's thanks to you that I've been able
to make it so far.
strings.description: A young man hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Ingus was chosen as a Warrior of Light when he helped to rid Castle Sasune of the curse it had suffered from the Djinn. He then set off on a journey with Luneth, Arc, and Refia to save his country, his people, and the world from the darkness consuming it. Always calm and composed, Ingus never fails to supports his comrades whenever they find themselves in a predicament.
strings.fusion:
Regardless the situation,
as long as you keep your cool
there's nothing you can't overcome.
strings.summon:
That smell... There's a battlefiled nearby.
This could be serious...

strings.evolution:
How's this?
I hope I'm at least a little bit stronger.
strings.affinity:
I couldn't do anything on my own.
It's thanks to you that I've been able
to make it so far.
strings.description: A young man hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Ingus is a dutiful and responsible soldier beloved by many, including the King. He loves Princess Sara, and she loves him in return, but he never acts upon it knowing that their relationship is an impossibility considering their origins. Having finally lifted the curse inflicted upon the castle by the Djinn, he set off on a journey with Luneth, Arc, and Refia to save the world.
strings.fusion:
To protect the world...
I guess in doing that I would be protecting Sasune, as well.
strings.summon:
I am Ingus, warrior of Sasune.
I'm not very powerful, but I'll do whatever I can to help.

strings.affinity:
I couldn't do anything on my own.
It's thanks to you that I've been able
to make it so far.
strings.description: A young man hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Ingus is an orphan who was raised as a loyal soldier of King Sasune's army. He is a levelheaded and honest young man who has won the trust of the King, and who has pledged his service to his country. Fortunately, he managed to escape the curse of the Djinn one day when he left the castle to train. Now he seeks his beloved, Princess Sara, who has gone missing, and hopes to free his people of the curse by heading to the Cave Altar with Luneth and the others.
strings.fusion:
Sasune...
I wonder how Princess Sara is doing...
strings.summon:
If there are crystals here too,
could that mean the Warriors of Light are here, as well?
